API Documentation

Everything you need to integrate double-entry accounting into your platform. From quickstart to advanced features.

Quick Start

# Record a sale with revenue split
curl -X POST https://api.soledgic.com/v1/record-sale \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "amount": 9900,
    "reference_id": "order_123",
    "creator_id": "creator_456",
    "platform_fee_percent": 20
  }'
View full quickstart guide

API Endpoints

EndpointDescription
POST /record-saleRecord a sale transaction with optional revenue split
POST /record-expenseRecord a business expense with IRS category
POST /process-payoutPay out creator or contractor earnings
GET /get-transactionsList transactions with filters and pagination
GET /trial-balanceGet current trial balance report
GET /profit-lossGenerate profit and loss statement
POST /record-refundProcess a refund with automatic reversal
POST /reverse-transactionReverse a transaction (immutable ledger)
POST /close-periodClose an accounting period
POST /reconcileBank reconciliation

Full documentation for all 27 endpoints available in the API Reference section.

Core Concepts

Double-Entry Ledger

Every transaction creates balanced debit and credit entries. Your trial balance always balances, providing bank-grade integrity for your financial data.

Immutable History

No edits, only reversals. Your audit trail is unforgeable and CPA-ready. Perfect for compliance and investor due diligence.

Creator Accounts

Automatic revenue splitting for marketplace platforms. Track creator balances, payouts, and 1099 thresholds automatically.

Schedule C Categories

Expenses automatically mapped to IRS Schedule C lines. Tax-time simplicity with export-ready reports.
